Condition.Expression: OB_WRP_active=true | OB_BOR_Level_active=true | (OB_User_Configuration1_active=true & (!SEM_OB_NRST_STOP_NULL | !SEM_OB_IWDGHW_NULL | !SEM_OB_NRST_STDBY_NULL | !SEM_OB_VDDIO_HSLV_NULL | !SEM_OB_IWDG_STOP_NULL | !SEM_OB_IWDG_STDBY_NULL | !SEM_OB_XSPI1_HSLV_NULL | !SEM_OB_XSPI2_HSLV_NULL )) | (OB_User_Configuration2_active=true & (!SEM_OB_AXISRAM_ECC_NULL| I2C1_I2C_FLASH| I2C1_SMBus_FLASH | I3C1_I3C_Controller_FLASH | I3C1_I3C_Target_FLASH)) | OB_DTCM_active=true | OB_ITCM_active=true

OB_BOR_Level_active=true |(OB_User_Configuration1_active=true & (!SEM_OB_NRST_STOP_NULL | !SEM_OB_IWDGHW_NULL | !SEM_OB_NRST_STDBY_NULL | !SEM_OB_VDDIO_HSLV_NULL | !SEM_OB_IWDG_STOP_NULL | !SEM_OB_IWDG_STDBY_NULL | !SEM_OB_XSPI1_HSLV_NULL | !SEM_OB_XSPI2_HSLV_NULL )) | (OB_User_Configuration2_active=true & (!SEM_OB_AXISRAM_ECC_NULL | I2C1_I2C_FLASH| I2C1_SMBus_FLASH | I3C1_I3C_Controller_FLASH | I3C1_I3C_Target_FLASH)) | OB_DTCM_active=true | OB_ITCM_active=true

OB_BOR_Level_active=true & SEM_OB_IWDGHW_NULL & SEM_OB_NRST_STOP_NULL & SEM_OB_NRST_STDBY_NULL & SEM_OB_VDDIO_HSLV_NULL & SEM_OB_IWDG_STOP_NULL & SEM_OB_IWDG_STDBY_NULL & SEM_OB_XSPI1_HSLV_NULL & SEM_OB_XSPI2_HSLV_NULL & SEM_OB_AXISRAM_ECC_NULL
OB_DTCM_active=false & OB_ITCM_active=false & (OB_User_Configuration2_active=true & (!SEM_OB_AXISRAM_ECC_NULL | I2C1_I2C_FLASH| I2C1_SMBus_FLASH | I3C1_I3C_Controller_FLASH | I3C1_I3C_Target_FLASH))
OB_DTCM_active=true & OB_ITCM_active=true & OB_User_Configuration2_active=true & (!SEM_OB_AXISRAM_ECC_NULL | I2C1_I2C_FLASH| I2C1_SMBus_FLASH | I3C1_I3C_Controller_FLASH | I3C1_I3C_Target_FLASH)

RefParameter.Name: OB_BOR_level
RefParameter.Description:
These bits contain the supply level threshold that activates/releases the reset.
They can be written to program a new BOR level value into Flash memory.
BOR level 0 (reset level threshold around 2.1 V).
BOR level 1 (reset level threshold around 2.1 V).
BOR level 2 (reset level threshold around 2.4 V).
BOR level 3 (reset level threshold around 2.7 V)

RefParameter.Name: OB_IWDG1_SW_UI
RefParameter.Description: Option Bytes User IWDG control mode.

RefParameter.Name: OB_nRST_STOP_UI
RefParameter.Description: FLASH Option Bytes User stop entry reset.

RefParameter.Name: OB_nRST_STDBY_UI
RefParameter.Description: FLASH Option Bytes User standby entry reset

RefParameter.Name: OB_IO_HSLV_UI
RefParameter.Description: FLASH Option Bytes User I/O High-Speed at Low-Voltage.

RefParameter.Name: OB_FZ_IWDG_STOP_UI
RefParameter.Description: FLASH Option Bytes User IWDG Stop Mode Freeze.

RefParameter.Name: OB_FZ_IWDG_SDBY_UI
RefParameter.Description: FLASH Option Bytes User IWDG Standby Mode Freeze.

RefParameter.Name: OB_XSPI1_HSLV_UI
RefParameter.Description: FLASH Option Bytes User XSPI 1 High-Speed at Low-Voltage.

RefParameter.Name: OB_XSPI2_HSLV_UI
RefParameter.Description: FLASH Option Bytes User XSPI 2 High-Speed at Low-Voltage.

RefParameter.Name: OB_ECC_ON_SRAM_UI
RefParameter.Description: FLASH Option Bytes User ECC on sRAM.

RefParameter.Name: OB_I2C_NI3C
RefParameter.Description:
The option byte I2C_NI3C settings is link to I3C or I2C peripheral enabling status.
This update and code generation of I2C_NI3C option byte is totally managed by the tool STM32CubeMX.

RefParameter.Name: OB_I2C_NI3C
RefParameter.Description:
The option byte I2C_NI3C settings is link to I3C or I2C peripheral enabling status.
This update and code generation of I2C_NI3C option byte is totally managed by the tool STM32CubeMX.

RefParameter.Name: OB_I2C_NI3C
RefParameter.Description:
The option byte I2C_NI3C settings is link to I3C or I2C peripheral enabling status.
This update and code generation of I2C_NI3C option byte is totally managed by the tool STM32CubeMX.

Condition.Expression: ((!SEM_OB_IWDGHW_NULL | !SEM_OB_NRST_STOP_NULL | !SEM_OB_NRST_STDBY_NULL | !SEM_OB_VDDIO_HSLV_NULL | !SEM_OB_IWDG_STOP_NULL | !SEM_OB_IWDG_STDBY_NULL | !SEM_OB_XSPI1_HSLV_NULL | !SEM_OB_XSPI2_HSLV_NULL) & OB_User_Configuration1_active=true) |((!SEM_OB_AXISRAM_ECC_NULL | OB_DTCM_active=true | OB_ITCM_active=true | I2C1_I2C_FLASH| I2C1_SMBus_FLASH | I3C1_I3C_Controller_FLASH | I3C1_I3C_Target_FLASH) & OB_User_Configuration2_active=true)

RefParameter.Name: OB_DTCM_AXI_SHARE
RefParameter.Description:
DTCM AXI share FLASH Option Byte.
- DTCM_AXI_SHARE = "0" or "3": DTCM 64 Kbytes
- DTCM_AXI_SHARE = "1": DTCM 128 Kbytes
- DTCM_AXI_SHARE = "2": DTCM 192 Kbytes

Once DTCM Flash Option Byte is updated and Memory Management Tool (MMT) is not enabled, Linker file should be adapted manually in the generated project
in order to benefit from the mapping change.

RefParameter.Name: OB_ITCM_AXI_SHARE
RefParameter.Description:
ITCM AXI share FLASH Option Byte.
-ITCM_AXI_SHARE: = "0" or "3": ITCM 64 Kbytes.
-ITCM_AXI_SHARE = "1": ITCM 128 Kbytes.
-ITCM_AXI_SHARE = "2": ITCM 192 Kbytes.

Once ITCM Flash Option Byte is updated and Memory Management Tool (MMT) is not enabled, Linker file should be adapted manually in the generated project
in order to benefit from the mapping change.

RefParameter.Name: OB_nWRP0
RefParameter.Description: Sector 0 to be write protected.

RefParameter.Name: OB_nWRP1
RefParameter.Description: Sector 1 to be write protected.

RefParameter.Name: OB_nWRP2
RefParameter.Description: Sector 2 to be write protected.

RefParameter.Name: OB_nWRP3
RefParameter.Description: Sector 3 to be write protected.

RefParameter.Name: OB_nWRP4
RefParameter.Description: Sector 4 to be write protected.

RefParameter.Name: OB_nWRP5
RefParameter.Description: Sector 5 to be write protected.

RefParameter.Name: OB_nWRP6
RefParameter.Description: Sector 6 to be write protected.

RefParameter.Name: OB_nWRP7
RefParameter.Description: Sector 7 to be write protected.

Condition.Expression: SEM_FLASH_OB_WRP & OB_nWRP0=true & OB_nWRP1=true & OB_nWRP2=true & OB_nWRP3=true & OB_nWRP4=true & OB_nWRP5=true & OB_nWRP6=true & OB_nWRP7=true
SEM_FLASH_OB_WRP & OB_nWRP0=false & OB_nWRP1=false & OB_nWRP2=false & OB_nWRP3=false & OB_nWRP4=false & OB_nWRP5=false & OB_nWRP6=false & OB_nWRP7=false

RefParameter.Name: HDPStartPage
RefParameter.Description: Start address that contains the first 256-byte block of HDP area (used for OPTIONBYTE_HDP).

RefParameter.Name: HDPEndPage
RefParameter.Description: End address that contains the last 256-byte block of HDP area (used for OPTIONBYTE_HDP).
